Symmetry codes: (A) −x + 1/2, y + 1/2, z − 1/2; (B) x, y, z − 1; (C) x − 1/2, −y + 1/2, z; (D) x + 1/2, −y + 1/2, z; (E) x, y, z + 1; (F) −x + 1/2, y − 1/2, z + 1/2. (b) View of the bimetallic {Cd(O2CR)4Ca(DMF)2O5} secondary building unit (SBU). (c) Polyhedral view of the 1D metal-carboxylate chain formed from SBUs and O5 atoms. (d) Polyhedral view of the 2D layer constructed from SBUs and the (k2-μ2)-(k2-μ2)-μ4-m-BDC2− anions. (e) Polyhedral view of the 3D microporous framework of 1. (f) Topological view showing the equivalent 3D framework of 1.
